IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENABLE AT-RISK INDIVIDUALS TO LIVE WITH DIGNITY IN THEIR COMMUNITIES BY PROVIDING COMPASSIONATE AND CULTURALLY SENSITIVE HEALTHCARE AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENABLE AT-RISK INDIVIDUALS TO LIVE WITH DIGNITY IN THEIR COMMUNITIES BY PROVIDING COMPASSIONATE AND CULTURALLY SENSITIVE HEALTHCARE AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES.
IRS990.Desc: TOTAL LIFE HEALTHCARE, INC. OPERATES A PACE PROGRAM IN NORTHEAST ARKANSAS TO PROVIDE HEALTHCARE AND RELATED SERVICES TO THE FRAIL ELDERLY. THIS PROGRAM SERVES THE SENIOR POPULATION AND PROVIDES FOR THEIR CHRONIC CARE NEEDS. THE OBJECTIVE IS TO PROVIDE A CONTINUUM OF CARE THAT EXTENDS THE PATIENTS' ABILITY TO REMAIN INDEPENDENT. TOTAL ENROLLMENT FOR THE PROGRAM FOR YE 9/30/2018 WAS 211 PATIENTS. ALL EXPENSES ARE INCURRED TO PROVIDE THIS SERVICE, AS THIS IS THE ONLY SERVICE PROVIDED BY THE PROGRAM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE D, PART X, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THEIR INCOME TAX POSITIONS UNDER THE GUIDANCE INCLUDED IN ASC 740. BASED ON THEIR REVIEW, MANAGEMENT HAS NOT IDENTIFIED ANY MATERIAL TAX POSITIONS TO BE RECORDED OR DISCLOSED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE D, PART XI, LINE 4B
FORM 990, SCHEDULE D, PART XII, LINE 4B
FORM 990, SCHEDULE J, PART II, COLUMN D
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INCREASE OF THE ACTUARIAL VALUE OF THE DEFINED BENEFIT PENSION PLAN IS NOT CALCULATED ON AN INDIVIDUAL EMPLOYEE BASIS BUT RATHER ON THE EMPLOYEE GROUP TAKEN AS A WHOLE. THE INCREASE IN EACH INDIVIDUAL'S BALANCE WOULD HAVE TO BE ESTIMATED USING ASSUMPTIONS UNIQUE TO THAT INDIVIDUAL RATHER THAN THE PLAN AS A WHOLE. THIS INFORMATION IS NOT AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME. HOWEVER, WE BELIEVE THE INCREASE TO EACH INDIVIDUAL'S ACCOUNT WOULD NOT MATERIALLY CHANGE THE COMPENSATION REPORTED. WE WILL WORK WITH OUR ACTUARY TO DETERMINE THE ANNUAL INCREASE IN FUTURE PERIODS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ST. BERNARDS HEALTHCARE, INC. IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF TOTAL LIFE HEALTHCARE, INC. THE MEMBER MUST APPROVE ANY TRANSACTION OVER $1 MILLION. THE DIOCESE OF LITTLE ROCK MUST APPROVE ANY TRANSACTION OVER $5 MILLION. IN ADDITION, THE MEMBER SHALL HAVE POWERS AND VOTING RIGHTS TO DO THE FOLLOWING: - ELECT THE DIRECTORS OF THE CORPORATION - REQUIRE THE CORPORATION TO IMPLEMENT THE CORPORATION STRATEGIC PLAN AND TO COMPLY WITH ANY NETWORK STRATEGIC PLAN APPROVED BY THE MEMBER - APPROVE THE CAPITAL AND OPERATING BUDGETS OF THE CORPORATION, WHICH BUDGETS SHALL BE DEVELOPED BY THE CORPORATION IN CONSULTATION WITH THE MEMBER - APPROVE PARTICIPATION BY THE CORPORATION, INCLUDING RENEWAL OF AGREEMENTS, IN NETWORKS, AFFILIATIONS, JOINT VENTURES, MERGERS OR ACQUISITIONS - APPROVE ANY AGREEMENTS BY THE CORPORATION, INCLUDING RENEWAL OF AGREEMENTS, WITH RESPECT TO ANY MEDICAL EDUCATION AFFILIATION - REQUIRE THE CORPORATION TO MAINTAIN ADEQUATE LEVELS OF INSURANCE OR SELF-INSURANCE PROGRAMS, AS WELL AS OTHER FORMS OF RISK FINANCING. THE MEMBER'S POWER SHALL INCLUDE THE AUTHORITY TO SPECIFY MAXIMUM SELF INSURED RETENTION LEVELS AND MINIMUM EXCESS INSURANCE LEVELS - APPROVE THE DEVELOPMENT, CONSTRUCTION OR IMPLEMENTATION BY THE CORPORATION OF ANY NEW HEALTH CARE FACILITY, PROGRAM OR SERVICE - APPROVE ANY AMENDMENT TO EITHER THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION OF THE CORPORATION OR THE BYLAWS - APPROVE A PLAN OF DISSOLUTION OF THE CORPORATION - APPROVE A PLAN OF MERGER OR CONSOLIDATION OF THE CORPORATION WITH ANOTHER CORPORATION, OR APPROVE THE SALE, LEASE, EXCHANGE OR OTHER DISPOSITION OF ALL, OR SUBSTANTIALLY ALL, THE PROPERTY AND ASSETS OF THE CORPORATION, AND - ORGANIZE OR ACQUIRE, OR AUTHORIZE OR APPROVE THE ORGANIZATION OR ACQUISITION OF, ANY SUBSIDIARY OR AFFILIATE OF THE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TOTAL LIFE HEALTHCARE, INC. HAS NO COMMITTEES WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY. THEREFORE, NO DOCUMENTATION IS REQUIRED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FOLLOWING PERSONS OR GROUPS: CONTROLLER OF ST. BERNARDS HEALTHCARE, INC., VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE OF ST. BERNARDS HEALTHCARE, INC., PRESIDENT/CEO OF ST. BERNARDS HEALTHCARE, INC., LEGAL COUNSEL, AND THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OF ST. BERNARDS HEALTHCARE, INC. PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTORS AND ABOVE ANNUALLY SUBMIT A WRITTEN STATEMENT DISCLOSING ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. MANAGEMENT INVESTIGATES ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS AND TAKES APPROPRIATE ACTION DEPENDING ON THE NATURE OF THE CONFLICT. LEGAL COUNSEL ALSO REVIEWS ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND ADVISES MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE NOT MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AUDITED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT ON A CONSOLIDATED BASIS. THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OF ST. BERNARDS HEALTHCARE, INC. ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: AUX TO ST BERNARDS MEDICAL CENTER
